content: MT-FPS-G Pipe shoe guide Adjustable guiding bracket for fastening MP-PS pipe shoes to Hilti MT modular girders ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier to install – slotted anchor holes to simplify pipe shoe positioning and fastening Adaptable – suitable for any size of Hilti MP pipe shoe in stand-up configuration Safer jobsites – avoid welding and drilling One-step installation – quicker and easier fastening by using Hilti MT thread-forming bolts Applications Fastening MP-PS pipe shoes to MT girders restricting the movement to axial sliding and vertical lifting Recommended for use in Indoor or Outdoor with low to moderate pollution (C3) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: S280GD+ZM300 Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - ZM Material thickness: 5 mm Technical Data | Material composition | S280GD+ZM300 | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - ZM | Material thickness | 5 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2330921 - Pipe Shoe Connector MT-FPS-GF OC - Package Size 8 pc - 2331081 - Pipe Shoe Connector MT-FPS-GL2 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2331080 - Pipe Shoe Connector MT-FPS-GL1 OC - Package Size 12 pc
